## useChat (hook)

### Import

```typescript
import { useChat } from '@livekit/components-react';
```

**Returns:**

{ send: ((message: string) =&gt; Promise&lt;void&gt;) \| undefined; chatMessages: ReceivedChatMessage\[\]; isSending: boolean; }
